column4: Hey Ubuntu. I have  a problem and I am wondering if there is any way I can fix it. Basically for whatever reason my memory stick has turned Read Only. I cant delete any files from it no matter what I do, I even tried formatting it from gparted (No important data on there at the moment). Anyone got any suggestions how I can format this USB stick?
Listerdl, not sure how to do that from windows
and actionParsnip, what do you mean>
- simply lug it in and right click - format - that might be an idea - otherwise sorry not too sure....(I did that before and it worked)
